title: 2007 Australian Grand Prix
summary: The 2007 Australian Grand Prix (officially the 2007 Formula 1 ING Australian Grand Prix)[3] was a Formula One motor race held on 18 March 2007 at the Melbourne Grand Prix Circuit, Melbourne, Australia. It was the first race of the 2007 Formula One season. The 58 lap race was won by Kimi Räikkönen for the Ferrari team after starting from pole position. Fernando Alonso finished second in a McLaren car, with teammate Lewis Hamilton third on his Grand Prix debut.
